data.meta_description: Obituary for Marilyn Marie Rutherford (Miller)  Huff |  Marilyn Marie (Miller) Rutherford Huff, was called home by her Lord, on May 28, 2010, at the MSU Breslin Cancer Center, in Lansing, while in the presence of her family and beloved...
data.meta_site_name: Marilyn Huff Obituary | May 28, 2010 | Portland, MI
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
